data.title: The Best Pittsburgh Steelers Linebackers of All Time
data.meta_description: Over 1K sports fans have voted on the 50+ athletes on Best Pittsburgh Steelers Linebackers of All Time. Current Top 3: Jack Lambert, Jack Ham, James Harrison ...
data.text:
Ranked By

11.2K votes

1.4K voters

3 reranks

Big fan of Pittsburgh football? Then check out this list of Pittsburgh Steelers linebackers with photos and seasons as starters. It includes every starting linebacker from throughout Pittsburgh Steelers history, including current linebackers and past ones. An important part of the Pittsburgh defense, the LB position includes middle or inside linebackers and outside (strong side or weakside) linebackers. Featuring 2018-2019 Steelers and some of the greatest NFL linebackers of all time, the best Steelers LBs include James Harrison, Jack Lambert, James Farrior, Larry Foote, and Lawrence Timmons.

Who are the best linebackers in Pittsburgh Steelers history? Here is every player who has ever held the position of Pittsburgh Steelers starting linebacker. Vote below, then head over and check out the best Steelers kickers ever.

Most divisive: Jason Worilds

Over 1.4K Ranker voters have come together to rank this list of The Best Pittsburgh Steelers Linebackers of All Time
